title: World Series Game 6: Los Angeles Dodgers v Toronto Blue Jays – live updates
summary: The Toronto Blue Jays are facing the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 6 of the World Series. David Lengel is providing live updates on the game. Fans can follow the action as the championship unfolds.

title: New Zealand v England: third men’s cricket one-day international – live
summary: Wellington hosts the third ODI between New Zealand and England, with reporters providing live updates throughout the match. Fans can follow the game through an over-by-over report for real-time insights. Stay tuned for key moments and player performances as the teams compete.

summary: On October 31, President Trump faced significant legal challenges, including unfavorable rulings in three separate cases. title: Breeders’ Cup 2025 horse racing: day one – as it happened
summary: Gstaad won the Juvenile Turf, marking a successful day for the O'Brien family. This victory highlights their continued excellence in horse racing. Overall, it adds to their impressive legacy in the sport.

title: ‘G’day Australia. Did you miss us?’ Oasis kicks off Australia tour with euphoric show
summary: Liam and Noel Gallagher made a notable return to Melbourne, showcasing their signature bucket hats at Marvel Stadium. The performance was polished and carried a warm, affectionate vibe. Fans were treated to a memorable show from the iconic duo.
